menu.description: Chicken dumpling steamed and served with momo achar and hot sauce.
A Savory Nepali classic Bamboo shoots, black eyes peasant potato blend for a perfect taste bud.
Fresh homemade cottage cheese cooked in delicately spiced gravy made from fresh spinach.
Boiled potato mixed with garlic ,ginger, coriander chop and blended spices.
Boiled wild boar meat cut into slice and sautéed with diced onion, tomato, capsicum & hot sauce
Juicy lamb rack marinated with chef special spiced and cooked in tandoor oven.
Boiled intestine of goat fried in oil with chopped onions, green chilly, coriander chop & spices.
Sekuwa sautéed in butter with vegetables & Bajeko masala and served on sizzler plate.
Mutton Sekuwa sautéed in butter with vegetables & Bajeko masala and served on sizzler plate. Khaja set will include soup, beaten rice, aloo tareko, bhatmas sandheko, achar and side salad.
Goat’s sternum cartilage shallow fried in a pan and sautéed with diced onion, capsicum ,tomato, dry chilly & hot chilly sauce.
